Johan Frost Bergman is a partner in the firm’s Funds and Investments practice group and is active in the firm’s Financial Institutions and Private Equity industry groups.

Johan focuses on the formation of private equity and debt funds, including partner and sponsor investment programmes, as well as handling limited partner mandates. He also advises on general partner restructurings, secondary transactions and the establishment of co-investment structures.

The reputable ranking institutes consistently recognise Johan as a leading practitioner in Sweden for fund formation and investment management (e.g. Chambers, IFLR1000 and Who’s Who Legal). He is recommended in Who’s Who Legal as both a Global Leader, Private Funds – Formation 2023 and a National Leader, Sweden – Private Funds 2023.
